          <title>
            <string language="de">Weltkarte-Puzzle</string>
            <string language="en">Map Puzzle of the World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puzzle de carte du monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enigma do mapa do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Puzzle del programma del mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γρίφος χαρτών του κόσμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rompecabezas de la correspondencia del mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Interaktives Puzzle. Historische Weltkarte von 1482 zum Zusammensetzen. Nach richtiger Fertigstellung folgt eine Erläuterung.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive puzzle. Historical map of the world from 1482 to assemble, followed by an explanation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Weltkarte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Map of the world</string>
          </keyword>

          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puzzle interactif. Carte historique du 
monde de 1482 à réunir, suivie d'une explication.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enigma interativo. Mapa histórico do mundo
de 1482 a montar, seguido por uma explanação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Puzzle interattivo. Programma storico del 
mondo da 1482 da montare, seguito da una spiegazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός γρίφος. Ιστορικός χάρτης του κόσμου 
από 1482 για να συγκεντρώσει, που ακολουθείται από μια 
εξήγηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rompecabezas interactivo. Correspondencia 
histórica del mundo a partir de 1482 a ensamblar, seguida por una 
explicación.</string>
          </description>
